item.description: First show is Mystic India playing at 4 pm. 2nd show we will see is Amazon starting at 5pm. Discount on the 2nd show. You need to make reservations for one or both shows. They do sell out. We will also make a trip to the gift shop probably before the films. They ask that we be there 20 min. before the first show. Up for an adventure! See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Just look around. We will be looking too.

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Museum of Science Omni Theatre
